fields.Name: Austin, TX
fields.Discount notes: Must be an Austin Energy customer to qualify. See full terms at the Austin Energy web site.

fields.Name: Burlington, VT
fields.Discount notes: If you are a current Burlington resident (or purchasing on behalf of a Burlington business), bring your ID along with a piece of mail with your name and Burlington address to receive a $200 point-of-sale rebate on an e-bike.Â The rebate may be redeemed at a participating retail shop.

fields.Name: Vermont
fields.Discount notes: Must be GMP customer with an active account.

fields.Name: Ashland, OR
fields.Discount notes: The e-bike incentive is available to Ashland Electric customers with an active account. Only one e-bike incentive may be issued per utility account.

fields.Name: Benton County, OR
fields.Discount notes: Benton County, OR residents with Pacific Power as your electricity provider, and a family income of less than 80% of the area median income.
fields.Internal Notes: Round 1 rebate period has closed. Last checked 9/25/2021

fields.Name: Holy Cross Energy (CO)
fields.Discount notes: HCE member with a 2 ebikes per household limit.

fields.Name: Edwards, CO
fields.Discount notes: Resident of Edwards Metro District with a 2 ebikes per household limit.
